scripts.build: cmake-js build --target anitomy_napi --runtime electron --runtime-version 31.2.1 && npm run package
scripts.build-debug: cmake-js build --target anitomy_napi --runtime electron --runtime-version 31.2.1 --debug && npm run package-debug
scripts.rebuild: cmake-js rebuild --target anitomy_napi --runtime electron --runtime-version 31.2.1 && npm run package
scripts.rebuild-debug: cmake-js rebuild --target anitomy_napi --runtime electron --runtime-version 31.2.1 --debug && npm run package-debug
